metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19218 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In LibSass 3.5-stable, there is an illegal address access at Sass::Parser::parse_css_variable_value_token that will lead to a DoS attack.

notes.Note: pfsmorigo> as of 2019-10-04, It's still an open issue

criterions.comment: libsass package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
